timeline.message: Compute distance metrics for text submissions

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Convenience method of extract all latest submissions from a TextExercise and compute pair-wise distancse.
          
          
            
                 * Convenience method to extract all latest submissions from a TextExercise and compute pair-wise distances.
timeline.author: JonasPetry

timeline.bodyText:
Iterating like that, items are only compared to items behind them in the list.
If there are submissions [a,b,c] and let's say a & c are identical, a would receive a low distance score and c would not be evaluated at all. Is this intended? If yes, I would indicate that somewhere in the documentation.
timeline.author: JonasPetry

replies.bodyText:
The idea behind the loop is to only compare each pair once.
for a,b,c we will compare a & b, a & c, and b & c.
On purpose, this leaves out a & a, b & a, b & b, c & a, c & b, and c & c.
replies.author: jpbernius
